power.title: Astral Wind
power.fluff: Divine wind screams from you to hurl your enemies back
power.section: Attack:Closewave 3each creature in the waveWisdom vs. Fortitude
Hit:1d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Level 21:2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage.
Effect:If the target willingly moves closer to you before the start of your next turn, it takes damage equal to 2 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.
Level 11:Equal to 6 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.
Level 21:Equal to 10 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Avenging Light
power.fluff: You smite your foe with a searing orb of light, an orb that burns with the fire of vengeance if your allies have been harmed
power.section: Attack:Ranged10one creatureWisdom vs. Fortitude
Hit:1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Level 21:2d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
If the target is adjacent to your ally that is bloodied, the attack deals additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Special:This power counts as a ranged basic attack.

power.title: Divine Bolts
power.fluff: You hurl bolts of divine lightning at your enemies
power.section: Attack:Ranged7/15one or two creaturesWisdom vs. Reflex
Hit:1d6 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage.
Level 21:2d6 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage.
Effect:The target takes a penalty to triggered attack rolls equal to your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Grasping Shards
power.fluff: You hurl a crystalline sphere of magic at your foes that splinters into hundreds of tiny, radiant blades which slide into your enemies and cover the ground
power.section: Attack:Areaburst 1 within 10each creature in the burstWisdom vs. Fortitude
Hit:Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus radiant damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Level 21:2 + Wisdom modifier + your implements enhancement bonus radiant damage.
Effect:The burst creates a zone of radiant splinters on the ground until the end of your next turn.
Squares in the zone are difficult terrain. A creature with immune radiant ignores this difficult terrain.

power.title: Hand of Radiance
power.fluff: Tendrils of radiance streak from your fingertips across the battlefield to strike your enemies, raining sparks of light on impact
power.section: Attack:Ranged10/20one, two, or three creaturesWisdom vs. Reflex
Level 21:one, two, three, or four creatures
Hit:1d4 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, or 2d4 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage if you only target one creature.
Level 21:2d4 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage or 4d4 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, respectively.
If an effect tells you to make one against a specific creature, you can only target that creature.

power.title: Mantle of the Infidel
power.fluff: Holding your implement high, you conjure a radiant mantle that sears a foe and marks it as an enemy of the faith
power.section: Attack:Ranged20one creatureWisdom vs. Will
Hit:1d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Level 21:2d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.
Effect:You can mark the target until the end of your next turn.
Until the end of your next turn, whether you marked it or not, the penalty that the target takes from being marked increases from -2 to -4.

power.title: Sun Strike
power.fluff: A beam of radiant energy extends from your hands to bathe a foe in searing light, forcing it to move
power.section: Attack:Ranged7/15one creatureWisdom vs. Reflex
Hit:1d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you slide the target up to 1 square.
Level 21:2d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and slide up to 2 squares.

power.title: Vanguard's Lightning
power.fluff: Bolts of divine lightning arc from your hands to scorch the area before you, then linger to avenge any attacks made by your foes
power.section: Attack:Areaburst 1 within 10each creature in the burstWisdom vs. Reflex
Hit:1d6 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage.
Level 21:2d6 + Wisdom modifier lightning damage.
Effect:Until the end of your next turn, whenever the target makes a reactive strike, it takes lightning damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.
Level 11:3 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus lightning damage.
Level 21:6 + your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus lightning damage.

power.title: Visions of Blood
power.fluff: The images of carnage and death that you invoke sow doubt in your enemies
power.section: Attack:Closewave 3each creature in the waveWisdom vs. Will
Hit:1d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage.
Level 21:2d6 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage.
Effect:The target takes a -1 penalty to all defenses until the start of your next turn.
